message: I'll take the majority, but I'm open to negotiation. Let's split it fairly!
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Let's be realistic, the value decreases rapidly for you with each round.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I need a more even split to make it worthwhile for me.
